description: You shouldn’t have much of a reason to take off the versatile Aenergy Hybrid Hooded Jacket. This lightweight, stretchy and highly breathable jacket combines a medium-weight, double-woven softshell and lightweight storm fleece with waffle structure to protect you against wind and harsh weather. Different fabrics are used for different zones to provide excellent freedom of movement and function in the right places. Whether you need active moisture management during speedy ascents or protection against strong winds on climbs – the Aenergy Hybrid is the best option for many activities.
name: Mammut Aenergy SO Hybrid Hooded Jacket - Mens
